info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 4:37PM CDT until July 01 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wabash County in southeastern Illinois... Southern Edwards County in southeastern Illinois... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 437 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Albion, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mount Carmel, Albion, Grayville, Bellmont, Bone Gap, Keensburg and Browns. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
